evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: The Court approves the Settlements of the claims of minor Plaintiffs B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A. in this Lawsuit.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: The Court approves placement of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.’s portions of the Settlements into pooled minors’ trusts operated by Legacy Enhancement until they reach the age of 18, 21, or 25.
